upanishad: The Upanishads, Part 1 (SBE01): Khândogya Upanishad... | Sacred Texts Archive
translator: Max Müller (Sacred Books of the East) — Public Domain
text: 29:5 Upamantrayate sa hiṅkâro, g ñapayate sa prastâva h , striyâ saha p. 30 s ete sa udgîtha h , pratistrî saha sete sa pratihâra h , kâlam ga k kh ati tan nidhanam, pâra m ga k kh ati tan nidhanam. Etad vâmadevyam mithune protam. 2. Sa ya evam etad vâmadevyam mithune prota m veda, mithunî bhavati, mithunân mithunât pra g âyate, sarvam âyur eti, g yog g îvati, mahân pra g ayâ pa s ubhir bhavati, mahân kîrttyâ. Na kâ m k ana pariharet tad vratam.
